snippet: The Sealed Mindset gun range in suburban Minneapolis offers the pricey role-playing experience of killing Osama bin Laden.
abstract: Sealed Mindset gun range in the Minneapolis suburb of New Hope offers the role-playing experience of killing Osama bin Laden; participants pay $325 for two hours of Navy SEAL training and a chance to re-enact the 2011 raid on Bin Laden's compound in Abbottabad, Pakistan, pelting a fake Bin Laden with paint bullets.
lead_paragraph: The Sealed Mindset gun range in suburban Minneapolis offers the pricey role-playing experience of killing Osama bin Laden.

headline.main: Role-Playing at the Range, Bin Laden in Their Sights
headline.print_headline: Role-Playing at the Range, Bin Laden in Their Sights
